title: Elegant Navratna Kundan Choker - Panchala Haaram
features: A breathtaking choker featuring a center pendant with a floral motif crafted in intricate Kundan setting with uncut diamonds. The pendant is adorned with a central ruby and surrounded by emerald accents. The multi-strand necklace combines lustrous freshwater pearls and vibrant green emerald beads. Delicate emerald droplets dangle from the pendant, each accented with a tiny pearl. Handcrafted in Hyderabad using traditional techniques, showcasing exemplary 'nakshi' work.
occasions: and traditional South Indian ceremonies like muhurtham
or half-saree function (Voni Function). Can also be styled for sophisticated evening events.
description: This exquisite choker seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The lustrous combination of pearls, emeralds, and rubies, set in gold with a Hyderabadi polish, offers a timeless and luxurious appeal. The intricate Kundan work demonstrates exceptional craftsmanship and adds cultural significance to the piece.
